mapper.insert: insert into club_member(club_no, mem_no, mem_gender, mem_email, mem_phone, mem_name, mem_birth) values(#{club_no}, #{mem_no}, #{mem_gender}, #{mem_email}, #{mem_phone}, #{mem_name}, #{mem_birth})
mapper.update: update club_member set club_no=#{club_no}, mem_no=#{mem_no}, mem_gender=#{mem_gender}, mem_email=#{mem_email}, mem_phone=#{mem_phone}, mem_name=#{mem_name}, mem_birth=#{mem_birth}, club_mem_regdate=#{club_mem_regdate}, club_mem_flag=#{club_mem_flag} where club_no=#{club_no} and mem_no=#{mem_no}
mapper.delete: delete from club_member where club_no=#{club_no} and mem_no=#{mem_no}
mapper.select: select * from club_member where club_no=#{club_no} order by club_mem_regdate desc
select * from club_member where club_no=#{club_no} and club_mem_flag='TRUE' order by club_mem_regdate desc
select * from club_member where club_no=#{club_no} and club_mem_flag='FALSE' order by club_mem_regdate desc
